csw:Record.dc:title: Global Ocean- Real time in-situ observations objective analysis
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
'''Short description:''' For the Global Ocean- Gridded objective analysis fields of temperature and salinity using profiles from the in-situ near real time database are produced monthly. Objective analysis is based on a statistical estimation method that allows presenting a synthesis and a validation of the dataset, providing a support for localized experience (cruises), providing a validation source for operational models, observing seasonal cycle and inter-annual variability.
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00037
